result.arabic_text: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتَ أَنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡكَهۡفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُواْ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا عَجَبًا
result.translation: Do you think that the people of the Cave and the Inscription were of Our only wondrous signs[8]?
result.footnotes: [8] Rather, there are many other wonders of Allah such as the creation of heavens and earth.
